entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • List Collection Performance in NativeAOT #66620
  • [wasm] windows specific performance regression #66615
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] benchmark sample crash #66614
    7.0.0
  • Add class X509SubjectAlternativeNameExtension.cs : X509Extension #66613
  • Feature Proposal: Allow access to internal read buffer of certain Streams #66611
  • Feature Proposal: Buffered read stream with direct buffer access #66610
  • [DllImport] on Windows fails to load library on case sensitive filesystem #66608
  • System.Text.Json POCOs with constructor deserialization do not support metadata reads #66604
    7.0.0
  • GC regions failure in System.Threading.Tests.dll #66601
    7.0.0
  • Many libraries tests are not robust against line endings #66600
  • [WebToolsE2E] Running console app 7.0 with the code "Console.ReadKey();" in Program.cs, an extra "13" appears in the command prompt. #66596
    7.0.0
  • TerraFx.Interop.Windows is not getting trimmed when compiled using NativeAOT #66593
  • How to calculate percentile using System.Diagnostics.Metrics.Histogram #66592
    7.0.0
  • [WASM] Workloads-.BlazorWasmBuildPublishTests failed on Build Browser wasm Linux Release WasmBuildTests sporadically #66591
  • Support system-wide enforcement of default authentication with proxy #66587
  • ARM32 register conflict for large stack frames and tailcalls #66585
    7.0.0
  • microsoft.xmlserializer.generator.6.0.0.nupkg fails to upload to nuget.server #66584
  • Test failure System.Numerics.Vectors.Tests #66583
  • Assertion failed '!foundMismatch' during 'LSRA allocate' #66580
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'inVarToRegMap[varIndex] == REG_STK' during 'LSRA allocate' #66579
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'interval->isSpilled' during 'LSRA allocate' #66578
    7.0.0
  • PipeReader.ReadAtLeast API conformance #66577
    7.0.0
  • NativeAOT InvalidCastException while compiling a generic mess #66573
  • Test failure System.Runtime.InteropServices.HandleCollectorTests.TestHandleCollector #66571
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\General\\Regression\\GitHub_47236\\GitHub_47236\\GitHub_47236.cmd #66570
  • Test failure GC\\API\\Frozen\\Frozen\\Frozen.cmd #66569
  • Test failure Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_16833/Test16833/Test16833.sh #66568
  • Test failure GC/Coverage/LargeObjectAlloc2/LargeObjectAlloc2.sh #66567
  • Test failure GC\\Coverage\\LargeObjectAlloc2\\LargeObjectAlloc2.cmd #66566
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\GitHub_35821\\GitHub_35821\\GitHub_35821.cmd #66565
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Performance\\CodeQuality\\Roslyn\\CscBench\\CscBench.cmd #66564
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/DevDiv_461649/DevDiv_461649/DevDiv_461649.sh #66563
    7.0.0
  • Android Build Needs To Be Updated - Doc And Termex #66562

Closed

  • `DisableRuntimeMarshalling` causes `UnmanagedCallersOnly` methods taking enums to throw `InvalidProgramException` #66602
    7.0.0
  • Generic attributes: Attribute.GetCustomAttributes returns null when passed an unbound generic type #64335
    7.0.0
  • Pattern matching ReadOnlySpan<char> is worse than String #66529
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Enum.HasFlag<TEnum>(TEnum flag) #66261
  • Stack overflow causes process to crash without diagnostic error message (Program halts with `Bus error: 10` on .NET 6 osx-arm64) #66302
  • Add `GC.IsPinnedHeapObject(object obj)` API #33542
    Future
  • Regressions in System.MathBenchmarks.Double #65513
  • WebSocket deadlock when the load is low and KeepAlives are not disabled #66595
  • [API Proposal]: `System.Math.Abs` overload for `System.Numerics.Complex` as `Complex.Magnitude` property #66494
  • Optimized repeated string search API #44794
    Future
  • System.Text.Json source generator does not support ReferenceHandler.Preserve option #64813
    7.0.0
  • Add support for clearing ConfigurationManager sources (was possible in version 5) #61675
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: add virtual Clone method to System.Random #63911
  • [API Proposal]: Rename IsInstanceOfType #62984
    Future
  • Provide default implementations for older Stream methods in the form of static helper methods #61730
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Extend ManagementObjectSearcher with Async methods #61290
  • [API Proposal]: Add System.Guid support to StringBuilder #58458
    Future
  • terrafx.interop.windows and Assembly.FullName problem when compile using NativeAOT #66545
  • GC.MarkAsTemporary(object obj) && GC.CollectTemporary() #57291
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add StringSplitOptions.RemoveDuplicates. #56761
    Future
  • Missing Span/Memory overloads #54697
    Future
  • [Proposal] Add ReadOnlySpan<char> overloads to Console.Write(Line) #54529
    Future
  • String Left and Right methods #53826
    Future
  • Channels: a minimum capacity before WaitToWriteAsync() returns. #52544
    Future
  • Why not extend String class with String.AnyNull(params string[] strings) and String.AllNull(params string[] strings)? #52315
    Future
  • Add Volatile.Read for readonly variable #53611
    Future
  • Test failure System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.WriteValueTests.CanWriteValueToJsonArray #66425
  • To strict "ref-to-escape" behaviour for `System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe.NullRef<T>()` #49808
    7.0.0
  • Make RuntimeHelpers.IsBitwiseEquatable public #46017
    Future
  • Really need an object.ToString(IFormatProvider) to hunt down code quality issues #47606
    Future
  • Add string.Create() with function pointer #45540
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: `HttpPostJson<TRequest, TResponse>`/`HttpPutJson<TRequest, TResponse>`/`HttpPatchJson<TRequest, TResponse>` extensions #66262
  • DangerousAcceptAnyServerCertificateValidator for RemoteCertificateValidationCallback #42482
    Future
  • virtual Task CopyToAsync(byte[] destination, CancellationToken cancellationToken) (and its sync version) for abstract class Stream #42109
    Future
  • Provide an API to show number of allocations per thread #40585
    Future
  • Proposal: StringBuilder.AppendJoin(StringBuilder separator, IEnumerable<StringBuilder> values) #40525
    Future
  • Make GraphQL a part of .NET #40413
    Future
  • NetworkInterface Extensions #39565
    Future
  • NetworkInformation Enhancements #39563
    Future
  • New rules related to "pure" methods #38860
    Future
  • [Proposal] Stream.IsAsynchronous property #38797
    Future
  • Remove [DisallowNull] from IEqualityComparer<T>.GetHashCode by interpreting existing contracts as applying to nonnullable T only #37569
    Future
  • Try a String.Replace with 1-length oldValue and multi-length newValue #44061
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add `Lookup<TKey, TElement>.Empty` and other static factories #65565
    Future
  • Getting file descriptor count on macOS throws #65254
  • UInt64 comparison operators ambiguity #28910
    Future
  • Test failure System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.WriteValueTests.SerializeExceedMaximumBufferSize #66487
  • MemoryManager<T>.Dispose() is not public #26262
    Future
  • Add a Span.TryCast extension method #24740
    Future
  • Designing an [AttributeCtorUsageAttribute] that constrains the constructor of a custom attribute to declare the specified target #29243
    Future
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2020-8927 | .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #66346
  • [Proposal] CancellationToken.Register<T> #30529
    Future
  • SafeHandle/CriticalHandle class that doesn't implement IDisposable #1333
    Future
  • FileStream leaks enormous amount of memory #64632
  • System.Net.CookieContainer的bug，未能正确分辨domain最匹配的 #66526
  • Possible Regression in FileStream.Write #58566
    Future
  • Add IAsyncEnumerable file enumerators #24436
    Future
  • Create x-plat System.Security.Principal.Identity #19909
    Future
  • Generating a new request from within a DelegatingHandler #66576
  • Review workaround for TailCallStress mode #65934

PullRequests

Created

  • ARM64 - Emitting `msub` instruction #66621
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WIP: Pack Stopwatch into a single long #66619
    community-contribution
  • JIT: enable reading PGO data when switching to optimized #66618
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Dedup SymbolicRegexMatcher construction #66617
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Delete IL verifier support in the VM #66616
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix macOS ARM64 stack overflow detection #66612
    Servicing-consider, area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Console.ReadKey should print a char, not an integer #66609
    area-System.Console
  • Set SocketsHttpHandler's default connect timeout to 15s #66607
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Add additional trace to HttpConnectionPool #66605
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Revert "[Mono] Enable emitting intrinsics for System.Numerics.Vector<T> on arm64" #66598
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Vector conversion methods #66597
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix KeepNativeSymbols to work on mono as well #66594
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Vector dot product #66589
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix register conflict between freeing large stack frames and fast tailcalls on arm32 #66588
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Vector unary plus operator #66586
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Some small copy propagation changes #66582
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • A bunch of small regex tweaks #66572
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Disable eventpipe test on OSX/x64 #66606
  • [PERF][MAUI]dotnet-podcast startup time and size measurements #65813
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Issue 66496 #66549
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Use `wasm-tools` workload to run benchmarks for wasm #66493
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove BB limit from importer_vectorization #66534
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Remove 4146 from libunwind #66427
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Fix macOS ARM64 stack overflow detection #66599
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Fix typo in managed port of strong name validation #66554
    area-System.Reflection
  • [wasm] Use `npm` from emsdk when running `sanitize.py` #66533
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Vector WidenLower and WidenUpper on Arm64 #66512
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • ARM64 - Optimizing a % b operations #65535
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix JsonSerializer src-gen issues with reference handler feature #66422
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Make ConfigurationManager.Sources public #66485
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Initialize debugger_tls_id on WASM as well. #66560
    area-Debugger-mono

Updated

  • Fix #41618 Correct marshalling of SortKey objects on Linux #65548
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Implement X500DistinguishedNameBuilder #66509
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • ARM64 - Optimizing a % b operations part 2 #66407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose `LibraryImportAttribute` #66434
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging` #65262
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Refactoring and perf of reflection Invoke #66357
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Load C++/CLI DLLs built against .NET 7.0+ in default ALC #66486
    area-Host
  • Introduce write barriers in wasm bindings, migrate to ref/out params, add gc safe regions #65994
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Make the `EventSource` generator incremental et.al. #64579
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] First draft of debug on firefox #61776
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix for number of used frame infos during crossgen2 compilation #64549
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add tracing to the Linux X509Chain implementation #65860
    area-System.Security
  • Structs: Do not mark "Hidden buffer pointer" as address-exposed #64130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix stepping issues with ReadyToRun and TieredCompilation #66491
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Remove condition that forbids promotion of HFAs with CUSTOMLAYOUT flag #64863
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve NamedPipeClientStream.Connect edge cases handling #65553
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [draft] hot reload WIP #66455
    NO-MERGE, area-EnC-mono
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [release/5.0] Remove usages of native bootstrapping (#65901) #66406
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fixes Binding to non-null IEnumerable doesn't work #36390 #66131
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Add a flag to link against the system brotli #66462
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Ensure serializer reflection-dependency sentinel is accurate #66522
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Enable some ARM32 tests #66553
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Only use first field maps for shared statics #66558
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Don't cache commandline in coreclr diagnostics server #63356
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Fix pal_assert.h when PAL_STDCPP_COMPAT defined #64631
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use RunContinuationsAsynchronously for block completion tasks #61140
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [release/5.0] Backport AVX context fix #66120 #66356
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix System.Text.Json tests affected by DST #66559
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Enable CA1822 (Mark members as static) analyzer #66333
    area-Meta
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [ILVerify] Reporting verification error on protected blocks with more than one handler #64582
    area-ILVerification
  • Remove 4267 suppression from mono #66552
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • skip the test when dotnet.exe is locked #66196
    area-System.IO, test-enhancement, 7.0.0
  • Add xarch `blsmsk` #66561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add optimization "X & 1 == 1" to "X & 1" (#61412) #62818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Draft for x ^ 0 opt (#65071) #65072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • DebuggerDisplay Stopwatch #65753
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • issue-2214 Create File.ReadLinesAsync() #66492
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Align API surface of immutable collections and their corresponding builder types #66550
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Improve String.Substring performance #62577
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • FileSystem: MoveDirectory: some improvements. #65132
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm]Enable WASM exceptions as an experiment #66524
    NO-REVIEW, area-Build-mono
  • Add xarch `blsi` #66193
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM]: Outstanding tasks tracking issue #1828

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add support for GT_NULLCHECK #1871

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Support for storing locals of type struct #1866

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Installing workloads fails when using rollback files with workloads that only exist in a previous band #24368
  • Add --force-english-output switch to dotnet list package #24356
    Backlog
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-preview.3.22161.14] latest build breaks WinForms/WPF apps #24355

Closed

  • ReadyToRun publishing fails in 6.0 due to NETSDK1095 #20701

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #24367
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Pin Microsoft.CodeAnalysis version for API Compat to the 4.0.x stable package #24362
    Area-Compatibility
  • Improve error message for the case when Crossgen2 package is not present #24324
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • Add job dependency on source build #24366
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.3xx]Add job dependency on source build #24365
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.2xx] Add job dependency on source build #24364
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Add job dependency on source build #24363
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Improve loading of Roslyn assemblies on validate package task (#22277) #24339

Updated

  • Switch away from expiring helix queues #24078
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #24308
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: "file private" visibility #5529
    Needs More Work
  • [Proposal] Required Properties #3630
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Auto-default structs #5737
  • [Proposal]: Practical existential types for interfaces #5556
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Updates to native-sized integers proposal #5920

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Provide a discoverable setting to enable all auto-default warnings #60176
  • Compiler crash #60175
  • Test plan for "auto-default structs" #60167
    C# 11.0
  • VS2017 Preview error VB editor with a Try-Catch inside another Try-Catch #60166
  • Code editor stop working when primitive type in lambda parameter #60164
  • Can't debug roslyn analizers #60161
  • An extra space will be inserted into `(` and `[` token for recursive pattern and list pattern #60160
  • Semantic info not showing for operators in relational patterns #60158
  • Cannot use fix provider for the issues identified in RegisterCompilationAction #60155
  • F1 service redirects to binary operator for `>` in type argument list (generic method invocation) #60154
    17.2

Closed

  • C# LSP Regex completion does not work as expected. #59545
    17.2
  • C# LSP does not auto-close XML elements in documentation comments #59530
    17.2
  • F1 keyword help for `private protected` should not send you to help for `private` or `protected` #23881
    16.8.P2
  • `this` not showing up in a property initializer #57886
    17.2
  • [Use switch expression (IDE0066)]: Incorrect Code Suggestion #60159
  • isPartial check in SourceOrdinaryMethodSymbolBase.MakeModifiers is not verified by tests #55825
    Backlog
  • Valid keywords missing from completion list between parentheses #58921
    17.2
  • "Use compound assignment" leaves empty whitespace if expression spans lines #35870
    Backlog
  • Complete statement command doesn't work with property initializers #56533
    Backlog
  • Improve "Convert regular string to interpolated string" refactoring #60148

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplifier options #60174
    Area-IDE
  • Fix symbol-finder crash in mixed C#/TypeScript projects #60173
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #60171
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #60170
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1662698 #60168
  • Enable .Net Core OOP by default #60163
    Area-IDE
  • Port encapsulate field tests to new harness #60162
    Area-IDE
  • Feature/null conditional await syntax #60157
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Handle more cases in F1 help service #60156
    Area-IDE, Community

Merged

  • Disable IntelliCode RepositoryAttachedModels in CI #60119
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Provide keywords in completion list in certain CastExpression context #60102
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use a longer timeout if we previously had a successful Source Link result #59698
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #60172
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove unneeded `isPartial` check #59978
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Remove enableRoslynAnalyzers from settings.json #60165
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Report a "better" error for an unmatched checked user-defined operator. #60111
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Merges/main to release/dev17.3 #60137
    Area-IDE
  • Update 17.1-vs-deps to 17.1 in PublishData.json #60126
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #59939
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #60123
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #59858
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into CheckedUserDefinedOperators #60149
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Fixed compound assignment #60116
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into Utf8StringLiterals #60150
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Support property initializer statement completion #60151
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60153
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60177
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Implicit field initialization in struct constructors #59788
    Area-Compilers
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Build with net6.0 #59429
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Global indentation options #59679
    Area-IDE
  • Formatting and code generation options #60127
    Area-IDE
  • Fix binding order for Dispose in async foreach #60022
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams
  • Analyze flow in receiver of extension method group in delegate creation #60093
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement handling of rename intent #59410
    Area-IDE
  • Initialize default capabilities before switching to the UI thread #60106
    Area-IDE
  • Use frozen partial semantics for syntax classification #60122
    Area-IDE
  • Fix type parameter scoping for local functions #60098
    Area-Compilers
  • Support smart escaping of text when pasting into string expressions. #60036
    Area-IDE
  • Add accessor to Razor test registration service #60121
    Area-IDE
  • Fixed simple signature help bugs #59969
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Ensure generated trees have a full path #60095
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Option to always use default symbol servers for GTD #60053
    Area-IDE
  • [17.1 servicing] Update version of Microsoft.VisualStudio.Telemetry #60096
    Area-Infrastructure, Approved to merge
  • Initial implementation of a new 'lightweight' background-work-indicator that we can use in-situ in the editor. #59759
    Area-IDE
  • Source generators/fix exception latching #59930
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Extend scope within nameof in attribute on method #40525
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, 17.1
  • Ensure declaring compilation can be located for source symbols created during compilation for EE evaluation. #60152
    Area-Compilers
  • Make navigate-to navigation cancellable. #59828
    Area-IDE
  • Remove obsolete helpers #60010
    Area-IDE
  • Provide name suggestions based on both collection and its element type #60129
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60044
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add FixAll in containing type/member support for code fixes #59989
    Area-IDE, 17.2.P2
  • Features/utf8 string literals #59774
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DefaultHttpContextFactory.Create(IFeatureCollection) does not set DefaultHttpContext._active #40705
  • Fix WindowsHostingBundle #40703
    7.0-preview3
  • ASP.NET Core Web Application w/Angular template on macOS Monterey will not start #40696
  • DO NOT WARN : BL0005 #40685

Closed

  • MacOs generating https keys #40680
  • Blazor WebAssembly cached client-side routing is taking precedence over reverse-proxy routing. #40684
  • Unable to run IIS Express tests locally #25107
    Test failures
  • Not able to debug blazorwasm project in VSCode #40568
  • Localized metadata for template is not localized templatestrings.{lang}.json #40666
  • Runtime & EFCore Dependencies Out of Date #40653
  • Visual Studio 2022 v 17.1 corrupting serviceworker.js when publishing to Windows app service not Linux app service #40544
  • System.IO.DirectoryInfo doesn't work properly in client-side Blazor #40686
  • ViewEngine can't find view in RCL without 'Views' folder in WebAPI project #40537

PullRequests

Created

  • Include arm64 payloads for hosting bundle #40709
    area-infrastructure
  • Only build hosting bundle on x86 #40708
    area-infrastructure
  • Hosting Bundle uninstall should uninstall underlying runtimes #40707
  • Make IResults types public #40704
    area-runtime
  • Blazor Prevent Stale Connection Usage Upon Reconnect #40702
    area-blazor
  • Revert "Revert "Remove downlevel runtimes from global.json"" #40701
    area-infrastructure
  • Normalize to arm64 in vcxproj #40697
  • Add `AddStackExchangeRedisCache` & `AddHsts` overload #40689
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Preserve non-ASCII header value char treatment in HTTP.sys. #40706
    7.0-preview3
  • Check-in launchSettings.json files from Middleware #40695
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • Revert "Remove downlevel runtimes from global.json" #40699
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Remove VS2019 from install script #40694
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Support tab characters in headers and unify validation code between servers. #40671
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Publish version files again #40693
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `c9461a9` to `ae1b7ad` #40691
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Remove downlevel runtimes from global.json #40393
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Update SDK to 7.0.100-preview.3.22163.1 #40688
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3

Updated

  • Add support for route handler filter factories #40667
    area-web-frameworks
  • Trim Http.Extensions #40561
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add architecture to targeting pack archives #40669
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ViewCell Disappears when unfocused #5292
  • Vertical ProgressBar #5288
  • StackLayout IsEnabled Property does not work #5287
  • [Mac Catalyst] MAUI unable to connect with db EFCore #5284
  • Entry TextColor and BackgroundColor set through attached behaviour not updating on Windows #5281
  • WebView Navigated and Navigating events do not occur #5280
  • Shell: Navigation within a tab causes an error #5275
  • On screen keyboad #5272
  • Application.Current.OpenWindow(window) does not open a new window #5271
  • MAUI Sqlite doesn't work on Mac M1 Monterey #5269

Closed

  • BlazorWebView interaction with components #5237
  • Typescript support in Blazor apps #5264
  • [Windows] Wrong Slider default track color #4093
  • [WinUI]Crashing issue when minimizing the app window #5184
  • FillRule property not working in Polygon and Polyline #4054
  • Label bound to a slider fails to update after a button is clicked #5270
  • [Bug] ListView start freeze after few items are appearing #3001
  • CheckBox - Use default control templates for WinUI3 #5145
  • [Bug] Theme not applied to Switch control (Android) #2249

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Blazor Hybrid page reloading for iOS #5291
  • Use Factory methods in DependencyInjection #5290
  • [samples] Add format example to DatePicker and TimePicker #5286
  • Call SetupDefault so that we have the right default Foreground TextColor for TimePicker #5285
  • [Windows] Fix issue updating dynamically Entry TextColor #5282
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, control-entry
  • Notify ISwitch.IsOn property changes if IsToggled changed #5276

Merged

  • [iOS] Update DatePickerHandler and TimePickerHandler #3761

  • [controls] remove Linq usage and collection copying #5246

  • Implement touch events in GraphicsView #3261

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IReadOnlyCollection<string> throws an exception with CosmosDB #27643
  • Add API to apply hierarchy mapping strategy for the whole model #27642
  • Clean up SaveChanges/batching tests #27640
  • Reverse-engineer composite keys to PrimaryKeyAttribute when using data annotations #27637
  • NU1202 Package Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore 6.0.3 is not compatible with netstandard2.1 #27636

Closed

  • KeyAttribute support for composite primary key #11003
    7.0.0
  • Must be reducible node thrown when projecting sub collection to a get only list. #27506
    Backlog
  • Are delete actions ignored by the Cosmos provider? #27572
  • Regression in Compiled-Query-Cache #27443
  • Consider adding empty default interface implementations for all interceptor interface methods #27625
    7.0.0
  • Log a warning when "rowid" is a column on the table #23918

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.25.0 to 3.26.0 #27641
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Attribute for configuring composite primary keys #27571
  • Add default interface implementations to interceptors #27635

Updated

  • Improve SQL Server insertion logic and other update pipeline optimizations #27573
  • Refactor ReaderModificationCommandBatch #27584
  • Add metadata support for TPC #27628
  • Support SQL Server UTF8 strings #27634
  • Fixes to support multi-dimensional arrays #27618

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider migrating the src/redist/targets path to an arcade sdk for sdk based installers. #13411

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0.1xx] Add the Red Hat test suite as a smoke test for source-build #13418

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #13412

Merged

  • Revert prior templatelocator and msbuildextension changes as they weren't required #13417
  • Remove maui workloads from 6.0.100 #13390
    Servicing-approved, Servicing-consider
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #13317

Updated

  • [release/6.0.1xx] dotnet watch smoke test #13392
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.2xx' #13399
